dict.string: We need access to your location to provide you with personalized and location-based services. This allows us to offer tailored recommendations, nearby offers, and find the closest stores or services in your area. Your location information will only be used within the app and will not be shared with any third parties. We prioritize your privacy and ensure that your data is handled securely. Granting location permission helps us enhance your overall experience and deliver the best possible service to you.
